main_definition: Tiles refer to small, flat pieces usually made of ceramic or other materials that are used as a covering for floors, walls, or roofs.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A unit in the game Tetris
meanings_and_examples.example: When I dropped another tiles block into place, it was satisfying to see the pattern form.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Slices of pie or other baked goods
meanings_and_examples.example: For dessert, we enjoyed a slice of apple tart with whipped cream on top.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A unit of measurement used in some ancient cultures, typically representing one square foot
meanings_and_examples.example: The floor area of the room was measured using tiles as units. It came out to be 20 tiles by 15 tiles.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A type of decorative mosaic made from small, flat pieces
meanings_and_examples.example: The bathroom walls were covered with beautiful blue and white tiles in intricate patterns.
